summary: This is an arrest warrant issued by a U.S. Magistrate Judge for Ghislaine Maxwell, commanding law enforcement to arrest her for charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury. The warrant was issued in White Plains, NY, as part of Case No. 20cr330 in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual named in the arrest warrant, accused of multiple federal offenses related to the enticement and transportation of minors, as well as perjury.

persons.name: Lisa Margaret Smith
persons.context: The issuing officer who signed the arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Arrest Warrant Issued for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A U.S. Magistrate Judge issued an arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell based on an indictment, charging her with conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was formally charged with federal crimes including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.
The arrest warrant was issued on June 29, 2020, by U.S. Magistrate Judge Lisa Margaret Smith in White Plains, NY.
The case is identified as United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, Case No. 20cr330, in the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York.
